Assumptions: Admin portal is accessible
Testcase Steps:
1. Go to admin login page
2. Enter valid username and password
3. Click Login
Expected Result: Admin is redirected to Dashboard

Assumptions: Admin portal is accessible
Testcase Steps:
1. Go to admin login page
2. Enter invalid username or password
3. Click Login
Expected Result: Error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed

Assumptions: Admin is logged in
Testcase Steps:
1. Login as Admin
2. Navigate to Products section
3. Click 'Add Product'
4. Fill product details
5. Save
Expected Result: Product is added successfully and visible in product list

Assumptions: Website is accessible
Testcase Steps:
1. Open browser
2. Navigate to website home page
Expected Result: Home page loads successfully with header, footer, and main sections
TestData: Expected Elements: Header, Footer, Navigation Menu, Banner, Featured Products

Assumptions: Website is accessible
Testcase Steps:
1. Open browser
2. Navigate to Products page
Expected Result: Products list is displayed with categories and filters
TestData: Expected Elements: Product categories, Product images, Product names, Prices, Filters

Assumptions: User has valid admin account
Testcase Steps: Login ? Navigate to /admin/team-members
Expected Result: Team members list is displayed

Assumptions: User is on Team Members page
Testcase Steps: Click “Add” ? Enter details ? Save
Expected Result: New member appears in list

Assumptions: At least one member exists
Testcase Steps: Select a member ? Edit details or Delete ? Confirm
Expected Result: Changes saved OR member removed

Assumptions: User is on Team Members page
Testcase Steps: Enter keyword in search box OR apply filter
Expected Result: Matching members are displayed

Assumptions: User is logged out
Testcase Steps: Log out ? Visit /admin/team-members directly
Expected Result: Redirected to login / Access denied

Assumptions: User has valid access to the categories section
Testcase Steps: 1. Login as Admin                                                                                                                                                                      2. Navigate to Categories page
Expected Result: Categories page loads successfully with a list of existing categories

Assumptions: User is on the Categories page
Testcase Steps: 1. Click 'Add Category'                                                                                                                                                           2. Enter category name                                                                                                                                                            3. Click 'Save'
Expected Result: New category is added and appears in the categories list

Assumptions: At least one category is available in the system
Testcase Steps: 1. Select a category                                                                                                                                                               2. Click 'Edit'                                                                                                                                                                                            3 . Modify category details                                                                                                                                                                   4. Click 'Save'
Expected Result: Category details are updated successfully

Assumptions: At least one category exists in the system
Testcase Steps: 1. Select a category2. Click 'Delete'3. Confirm deletion
Expected Result: Category is removed from the categories list

Assumptions: User is on the Categories page
Testcase Steps: 1. Enter search term in the search bar2. Press 'Enter'
Expected Result: Categories matching the search term are displayed

Assumptions: Admin is on Categories page
Testcase Steps: 1. Apply a filter from the filter options2. View filtered categories
Expected Result: Categories are displayed according to the selected filter

Expected Result: Products page loads successfully with a list of existing products

Assumptions: User is on the Products page

Expected Result: New product is added and appears in the products list

Assumptions: At least one product exists

Expected Result: Product details are updated successfully

Assumptions: At least one product exists
Testcase Steps: 1. Select a product2. Click 'Delete'3. Confirm deletion
Expected Result: Product is removed from the products list

Testcase Steps: 1. Enter search term in the search bar2. Press 'Enter'
Expected Result: Products matching the search term are displayed

Assumptions: User is on the Products page
Testcase Steps: 1. Apply a filter from the filter options2. View filtered products
Expected Result: Products are displayed according to the selected filter
